name: ESP32_SC_ENC_Manager
keywords: ethernet, WiFiManager, esp32, esp32-s2, esp32-s3, esp32-c3, WebServer, Communication, Credentials, Config-Portal, DoubleReset, MultiReset, littlefs, spiffs, dns-server, iot, lwip, enc28j60
description: ESP32_S2/S3/C3 + LwIP ENC28J60 Connection and Credentials Manager, with enhanced GUI and fallback Web ConfigPortal. This Library is used for configuring ESP32_S2/S3/C3 + LwIP ENC28J60 Credentials Manager at runtime. You can also specify static DNS servers, personalized HostName, static or DHCP IP. With configurable CORS Header and auto-Timezone features. Now using correct ESP32 chipIP
